dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach financial risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be aggressive in their pursuit of gains, taking calculated risks to achieve success.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security, avoiding high-risk investments whenever possible.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with new people?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be confident and charismatic in social situations, easily making connections.
Your FarTwin will prefer to observe from a distance, taking time to warm up to new people.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly express their emotions, using them to guide decision-making and relationships.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with trusted individuals.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex issues into manageable parts, using data and logic to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts and gut feelings to guide their problem-solving approach.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as images and videos.
Your FarTwin will learn best through practical experience, preferring hands-on training and experimentation.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Process
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will weigh options carefully, using logic and evidence to guide their choices.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings or personal values.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will stand their ground and assert themselves in conflicts, using direct confrontation to resolve issues.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground with the opposing party, working together to find a mutually beneficial solution.
